ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: A.H. held a doctoral scholarship at the Network Aging Research Heidelberg from September 2012 until May 2014, which was funded by the Klaus-Tschira-Foundation. Furthermore, the publication of this research is financially supported by Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft within the funding programme Open Access Publishing, by the Baden-Württemberg Ministry of Science, Research and the Arts and by Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg.
